reasoning: Prevalence is appropriate metric for anxiety disorders (chronic mental health conditions). Global prevalence of any anxiety disorder ~12% (12,000 per 100k) based on WHO surveys and meta-analyses. Includes GAD, panic disorder, social anxiety, phobias.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2007). Lifetime prevalence and age-of-onset distributions of mental disorders in the WHO World Mental Health Survey Initiative. World Psychiatry. 6(3):168-176
